#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int m,n;
        scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
        int k,l;
        k=(n-1)*m+(m-1);
        if(k%2==1)
           printf("%s\n","[:=[first]");
        else
            printf("%s\n","[second]=:]");
    }
    return 0;
}
